name: Harpoon (itch) (3th3rn3t)
description:
Harpoon is a mini-game made for the #teamseas foundation. #teamseas is a movement by Youtubers to remove trash in our "actual" oceans. #teamseas is removing 1lb of trash for every $1 donated! Participate with the link below:

https://teamseas.org/

Harpoon provides an amazing way of cleaning trash! Trash moving with a fast current will attempt to continue further into the ocean threatening the sealife, while "you", a ship will try to catch it out of the water.

Controls: A to move left, D to move right, and E to catch

Install instructions

1- Click play on the WebGL preview below
